group_1.textRight: We needed to stay by Kagome's side.
You okay…?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I've finished relaying the information@to everyone…

group_1.textRight: Why are you all in shock…?

group_1.textLeft: We can no longer sense Nanami's magic…

group_1.textRight: Eh…?

group_1.textLeft: Besides, just look at the place that was@supposed to be the Devil's weak point.
They gave it everything they had and it didn't@leave a scratch…

group_1.narration: ―Kagome―@I learned of the situation@from Mikoto's record…
―Kagome―@It's true that there should have been@a curse etched there, as Miss Mikoto said…
―Tsuruno―@I was positive that was the weak spot…@But the Witch is just too tough…
―Tsuruno―@...Hm?!@EVERYONE, MOVE!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101100:effect_shake]*Cough…*
How can we win if we can't damage its@weak point…?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we gotta concentrate our attacks into@a tiny point or something to break through…

group_1.textRight: Are we sure that's even possible…?
I know we can't afford to waste any time,@but I need to think things through…

group_1.narration: "Can everyone hear my voice?!"

group_1.textRight: *Gasp*

group_1.narration: "Excellent, I'm finally connected with you all.@Now that the Witch's power has weakened,@I can sense everyone's magic."

group_1.textRight: Iroha! I'm sorry!
We hit the Witch's weak spot, but it didn't do@anything at all…!

group_1.narration: "Don't worry. Yachiyo is fine."
"What's more, I'm sure@she can beat this Witch."

group_1.textRight: Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Um, but, we can't sense her magic anymore…!

group_1.narration: "That's because she traveled into the past."
"It was so she could resolve this situation."

group_1.textRight: No! That ain't good at all!

group_1.textLeft: Yes! She might be trying to take your place,@Iroha…!
Something like that was gonna happen here,@but Felicia stopped her!

group_1.textRight: The only reason I stayed here...
...was to make Yachiyo forget about doing@something crazy like that!

group_1.narration: "She won't be able to replace me now."
"She's appearing as a messenger of@the future to save the world and the people@who are about to be destroyed by this Labyrinth."
"From thousands of years ago…to now!"

group_1.textRight: Ah…?

group_1.textLeft: Yacchan is a messenger of the future…?@What are you saying…?

group_1.narration: "I wish I had never brought about this end.@I wish I had never even conceived of prosperity…"

group_1.textCenter: Don't give into despair like that.

group_1.narration: "Impossible."
"All that's left for me now@is to rot away into nothingness."

group_1.textCenter: But still, when you created that miracle@with your prayer,
you fulfilled the hope you had been bearing.
Even if it ends in tragedy, the power of hope@remains true.
So please don't give up. Keep believing.
Entrust your hope to me, and this will not end@in despair.
Someday it will become a miracle and free@the future from suffering.

group_1.narration: "Even if I rot away here, the hope that is within me@will continue to live on, illuminating the future…"
"But what should I do…?"

group_1.textCenter: When the time comes, you will remember me,@and I will carry your hope into the future.

group_1.narration: "What exactly…are you…?"
"I am the one who will open the way@to the future for Magical Girls…"
"Far into the future…when a curse transcending@time and space overtakes the world,@I will reach out to Magical Girls and bring them@the hope of those who were lost to history."
"...Tell me your name."

group_1.textCenter: I am an emissary of the future who will pave@the way to the future for Magical Girls…
…The one who will inherit Magical Girls' history.@I am the Historia of the future.

group_1.textRight: Unbelievable…an emissary who will save@Magical Girls at a time like this…

group_1.textLeft: But the entire world is engulfed by this@Labyrinth and filled with curses…

group_1.textRight: But don't you think…it sounds like that one@fairy tale from long ago…?
Yeah, I know what you mean, but ain't@that just a legend?

group_1.narration: "Yes, a legend connecting the future of a very@small Magical Girl who no one believed…"
"Yachiyo helped me create the mirror portal to her,@which allowed us to make this legend."
―Yachiyo―@Thank goodness all of you are okay.
―Tsuruno―@UWAAAAAAAAH!@Yachiyooo! It really IS you!
―Felicia―@You're seriously the messenger, Yachiyo?!@I mean, that outfit…it's amazing!
―Sana―@She's just like Athena@from Greek mythology…!
―Yachiyo―@Don't stare at me too much.@I didn't expect it would be this showy.
―Yachiyo―@Still, perhaps it means more Magical Girls@gave me hope than I'd expected.
―Touka―@So you took a gamble that could@potentially destroy the universe, huh…
―Yachiyo―@I've tried to ensure this power is delivered@to here alone.
―Nemu―@It all comes down to how@much power you've been granted.
―Yachiyo―@One person per year entrusted me with their hope.@That's one thousand per millennium.
―Yachiyo―@That many people have entrusted me with their hopes@and feelings. I will not let them go to waste.
―Yachiyo―@Here I will show my power to make@that legend a reality.
―Iroha―@The Witches in history, empowered by the mother Witch,@are still being held back by the past Magical Girls and me.
―Iroha―@In the meantime, please take advantage@of the Witch's weak point…!
―Yachiyo―@I'll converge all of my strength into@a spear to pierce through.
―Yachiyo―@I hate to ask this of you, but could all of you please@keep the Witch in check until I'm ready?
―Touka―@Can I ask everyone to eliminate@the Familiars and offshoot Witches, then?
―Touka―@I'll convert the magical power of the enemies@we've defeated so that we can use it to our advantage!
―Nemu―@That way, even if stronger Witches are unleashed,@we'll be able to handle them!

group_1.textRight: Let's all stick together until Yacchan is ready.

group_1.textCenter: You may rely on us for support.

group_1.textRight: Shall we step forward, then, Lady Nayuta?

group_1.textCenter: I won't let the futures of Diviners and the Land@of the Rising Sun be destroyed here!

group_1.textLeft: Let's turn things around on this Witch!!
